content.description: Sit start with some very good pockets and holds. make your way directly to the top. Topping out is the crux move. The top is very slopey and there are no holds. Use your feet to push above the top.
content.location: Located on the back of Block 1. On the closest corner to Block 2

content.description: Start on the low ledge an work your way up to the second ledge. The second ledge to the third ledge is the crux. I find it easiest to bring your right leg up to the ledge and turn your hips into the wall. This allows you to freely move your hands without falling. There are crimps and some better holds on top. Top out is a little tricky.
content.location: It is behind Jaws and on the large boulder. Giant dead tree by it.

content.description: Big Block 1 only has a few boulders on it. They are scattered around all four sides. Make sure you clean the top of the boulders for moss and dirt. Getting down is simple and safe.
